excerpt: "Naik envisions eOps Fabric to be as simple as using Netflix for their clients, allowing them to easily implement machine learning in their operations. This aspiration aligns with McKinsey & Co.'s 2023 forecast, predicting a $190 billion global investment in AI applications, including machine learning models."
